dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3463647F] Site in Violation of Copyright and DMCA - Urgent Action re
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, March 12, 2007 2:19 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3463647F] Site in Violation of Copyright and DMCA - Urgent Action required ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Site in Violation of Copyright and DMCA - Urgent Action required Added by system at Monday, Mar 12 2007 07:15 pm X-MailFrom: chris@cdc-marketingltd.co.uk X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Mar 12 19:15:01 2007 Received: (qmail 5302 invoked by alias); 13 Mar 2007 00:15:01 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 5299 invoked from network); 13 Mar 2007 00:15:01 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 13 Mar 2007 00:15:01 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 12 Mar 2007 19:15:00 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 12 Mar 2007 19:15:01 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from chris@cdc-marketingltd.co.uk) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HQufM-0003Rx-Rk for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 12 Mar 2007 19:15:00 -0500 Received: from smtp3.wanadoo.co.uk ([193.252.22.156] helo=smtp3.freeserve.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from chris@cdc-marketingltd.co.uk) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HQufJ-000JT5-G6 for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 12 Mar 2007 19:14:58 -0500 Received: from me-wanadoo.net (localhost [127.0.0.1]) by mwinf3213.me.freeserve.com (SMTP Server) with ESMTP id D2620B000084 for ; Tue, 13 Mar 2007 01:14:49 +0100 (CET) Received: from Barnes1 (user-5440a1d4.wfd76a.dsl.pol.co.uk [84.64.161.212]) by mwinf3213.me.freeserve.com (SMTP Server) with ESMTP id 2D883B000082 for ; Tue, 13 Mar 2007 01:14:49 +0100 (CET) X-ME-UUID: 20070313001449186.2D883B000082@mwinf3213.me.freeserve.com From: "Chris Cobb" To: Subject: Site in Violation of Copyright and DMCA - Urgent Action required Date: Tue, 13 Mar 2007 00:14:49 -0000 Message-ID: <000301c76504$9d9746c0$d4a14054@Barnes1> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0004_01C76504.9D9746C0" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 Thread-Index: AcdlBJ0uTJc8WS4EQ2SSizC2xTmfAA== X-OriginalArrivalTime: 13 Mar 2007 00:15:01.0070 (UTC) FILETIME=[A4189EE0:01C76504] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) I would like to inform you of the below: 1. I am the owner of this copyright material 2. My true name is Chris Cobb, Keel House, Witham Essex UK. 01376 510070 chris@cdc-marketingltd.co.uk 3. The material that has been infringed is the following: http://www.duvetdollars.com/Download_DD_docs/Page_DD77.html 4. The material that is infringing my copyrighted work is: Here he has placed direct links to my copyrighted products: www.WickedFire.com this site is in violation of copyright laws as well as illegal videos. 5. as above. These links were found on the following site: www.WickedFire.com and I would like them removed from your hosting immediately. 6. "In good faith I belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agents, or the law." 7. The information in this notice is accurate, under penalty of perjury. I have included a signature file. Sincerely, Chris Cobb MIME element (text/html)

I would like to inform you of the below:

3. The material that has been infringed is the following:

 

http://www.duvetdollars.com/Download_DD_docs/Page_DD77.html

 

4. The material that is infringing my copyrighted work is:

Here he has placed direct links to my copyrighted products: www.WickedFire.com this site is in violation of copyright laws as well as illegal videos.

 

5. as above. These links were found on the following site: www.WickedFire.com and I would like them removed from your hosting immediately.

 

6. "In good faith I belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agents, or the law."

 

7. The information in this notice is accurate, under penalty of perjury.

 

I have included a signature file.

 

Sincerely,

Chris Cobb
